pkgmetadata.longdescription: Split2flac splits one big APE/FLAC/WV/WAV audio image (or a collection of such files, recursively) with CUE sheet into FLAC/M4A/MP3/OGG_VORBIS/WAV tracks with tagging, renaming, charset conversion of cue sheet, album cover images. It also uses configuration file, so no need to pass a lot of arguments every time, only an input file. Should work in any POSIX-compliant shell.

use.flag: Try to guess the charset using enca
Add support for Flake, alternative FLAC encoder
Add support for Monkey's Audio files
Support for Replay Gain metadata, for relative volume adjustment
